title: MD
biography: Ram Narain Malhotra popularly known as R. N. Malhotra was the seventeenth governor of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI), serving from 4 February 1985 to 22 December 1990.
aiSummary: Ram Narain is a interventional cardiology expansion specialist with an H-index of 23 at Cardiology (Member). Has been published in The London Edinburgh and Dublin Philosophical Magazine and Journal of Science, Defence Science Journal, IACS Institutional Repository (Indian Association for the Cultivation of Science). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
